message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which holds immense value for you at $1500000. I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this exceptional item at an exclusive price tailored to reflect its importance to you. My proposal is to sell it to you for $1200000. This price not only ensures a significant benefit for you but also secures a substantial return for me. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer.
